name: Mines of Misory
description:
This is a game that im working on. Alot of things still have to be done but more levels coming a.s.a.p. Windows might think its a virus because I'm not  a verified publisher, so i guarantee there is no viruses. In beta

V2: Made some turrets and added another level to the game. Working on better art for the turrets updates for them coming soon.

V2.1: Added jump and changed attack see controls for details
